title: @Riot When should we expect to get our Iron Savior Morde back? :(

replies.body: Our Iron Savior is probably on a date with his Iron Maiden, so who knows how long it will be.  :P  In all seriousness, we do have a [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page up currently but I don't have any updates to offer.  Keep an eye out!
Thanks dude, will keep it open and pray for his swift recovery.
